summary: A replacement of the Legate Armor.
descriptionHtml:
This is a replacement of the legate armor. This is my first mod so I don\'t know how to make an .esp for the armor so these files just override vanilla files. Just remove the files to uninstall. Enjoy. There will be more to come.

If anyone is interested in helping me with some mods that has the ability to merge meshes in either nifscope or a 3d program please message me.
author: Envyme
